alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 31 at 1:15PM MST until August 31 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following areas, Dripping Springs, Globe/Miami, Mazatzal Mountains, New River Mesa, Pinal/Superstition Mountains, Rio Verde/Salt River, Superior and Tonto Basin. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall creating excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The atmosphere will increasingly become favorable for showers and thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall by Friday afternoon across east-central Arizona. Localized rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches is will be possible Friday afternoon and evening. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior; Tonto Basin
